name: Arcane Sparrow
text_description: A tiny bird with great potential. The Arcane Sparrow can absorb an enemy attack, converting it into +1 attack for itself.
illustration_description: A small but radiant bird perched on an ancient runic stone. Its body radiates a lighter shade of purple, with sparks of arcane energy jumping between its feathers. The surrounding environment is a serene twilight setting.
